description: List of repositories belonging to a product in an environment (resource: GET /katello/api/environments/:environment_id/products/:product_id/repositories)
name: environments.repositories_nvironments

available_for.description: interpret specified object to return only Repositories that can beassociated with specified object.  Only 'content_view' issupported.

connection.description: Name of <connection> from this pack's configuration that specifies how to connect to a server.

content_type.description: limit to only repositories of this type

content_view_id.description: ID of a content view to show repositories in

content_view_version_id.description: ID of a content view version to show repositories in

environment_id.description: ID of an environment to show repositories in

erratum_id.description: Id of an erratum to find repositories that contain the erratum

full_results.description: Whether or not to show all results

library.description: show repositories in Library and the default content view

order.description: Sort field and order, eg. 'name DESC'

organization_id.description: ID of an organization to show repositories in

password.description: Optional override of the password in <connection>. (required if <connection> is not specified)

per_page.description: Number of results per page to return

product_id.description: ID of a product to show repositories of

rpm_id.description: Id of a package to find repositories that contain the rpm

server.description: Optional override of the server in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified).

sort.description:
'description: Hash version of 'order' param
 parameters:
     by:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Field to sort the results on
     order:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: How to order the sorted results (e.g. ASC for ascending)
     '

username.description: Optional override of the username in <connection> (example: username@domain.tld) (required if <connection> is not specified).
